programme.title: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais não deixam. Cartman sugere que ele vá à polícia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O primo do Kyle, que também se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua mãe em South Park. Porém, apesar da mesma idade, os primos não tem nada em comum.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison

programme.title: Os locutores do show da baleia Jambú fazem com que as crianças acreditem que a baleia pode falar, e que ela se chama Willzyx, que está doente e morrerá se não regressar à sua casa na lua. Agora os meninos querem levar a baleia para a lua.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O pai de Kyle compra um carro híbrido e tenta convencer todas as pessoas de que esta é a melhor opção para cuidar do planeta. Porém, ao brigar com todos em função de sua atitude esquisita, se muda para São Francisco com sua família.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Duelo ao Sol, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: Quando seu pai é enforcado por atirar em sua esposa e seu amante, a birracial Pearl Chavez vai viver com parentes distantes no Texas.

programme.title: Virtude Selvagem, (1946, Western)
programme.desc: Jody Baxter, um garoto solitário que faria qualquer coisa para ter um novo amigo, decidiu fazer um pedido ousado aos seus pais: ter um filhote de cervo como animal de estimação na fazenda em que moram.

programme.title: Meu Nome é Ninguém, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: O honesto advogado Black Jack Gideon envolve-se na procura de um valioso e raro pônei japonês, que foi sequestrado, e por quem o bando de desertores renegados exige uma fabulosa quantia de resgate.

programme.title: O Homem com a Morte nos Olhos, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Na cidade de Hard Times, um estranho cavalga e aterroriza o pequeno povoado. Ele mata vários habitantes da cidade, incluindo Fee, o fundador da cidade.

programme.title: Keoma, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Ao final da Guerra Civil Americana, um pistoleiro mestiço, cansado de fazer da morte um meio de vida, retorna para aquilo que um dia costumava ser seu lar.

programme.title: O Grande Búfalo Branco, (1977, Western)
programme.desc: Em setembro de 1874 Wild Bill Hickok vai para o Velho Oeste, usando o nome de James Otis, pois precisa caçar um búfalo branco que sempre lhe provoca estranhos pesadelos.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: A Pistola é Minha Bíblia, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Após um violento assalto a uma diligência, com muitos tiros e ação explosiva, dois pistoleiros Tim e Larry, aparecem do nada, sem nenhuma informação sobre seu passado.

programme.title: Shalako, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Shalako está conduzindo uma expedição de caça em uma zona selvagem no Novo México.

programme.title: Vou te Seguir na Escuridão, (2020, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Uma mulher deprimida com a morte dos pais se envolve com um homem encantador. Quando ele desaparece misteriosamente após entrar em um prédio mal assombrado, ela promete encontrá-lo mesmo que tenha que atravessar para o mundo do sobrenatural.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: Legado de Violência, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando seu filho envolvido com negócios perigosos e pessoas de mau caráter foge, um pai se vê em meio a uma crise pessoal e familiar.

programme.title: Todo Mundo Ama Minha Mãe, (2018, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Uma dupla de mãe e filho são inadvertidamente despachados em um contêiner de Londres para o Marrocos com nada além de seus pijamas. A aventura os leva pela Espanha e França em uma jornada para voltar para casa e reconstruir seu relacionamento rochoso.

programme.title: Como assaltar um banco, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Ruggero é um homem tranquilo, mas impulsivamente decide roubar um banco para provar que é corajoso o suficiente para sua ex-mulher, que o abandonou.

programme.title: Rumo ao Fim do Mundo, (2014, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Em meio a uma catástrofe biológica que ameaça destruir a raça humana, as histórias de três casais se cruzam quando eles são forçados a tomar decisões difíceis que definirão seu futuro.

programme.title: Terminal Sud: Luta Por Liberdade, (2017, Foreign Drama)
programme.desc: Em um país mergulhado em um conflito armado, um médico tenta cumprir seu dever contra todas as probabilidades, até o dia em que seu destino vira de cabeça para baixo.

programme.title: Assassinos de Aluguel, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na história real de um escândalo que envolveu presidiários sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para políticos corruptos.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: Intermediário.com, (2009, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. O empresário Jack Harris tem uma linda família e uma carreira de sucesso, recuperando empresas problemáticas. Até que ele conhece Wayne Beering e Buck Dolby, uma dupla que atua com pornografia na internet.

programme.title: Ataque do Tubarão Mutante, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um tubarão gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a maré começa a subir, o tubarão mutante de duas cabeças ressurge e ninguém está a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Zombies)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contágio, (2005, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: Carnivore: Um Lobisomem de Londres, (2017, Werewolves)
programme.desc: Enquanto tentam reacender seu relacionamento em uma casa de campo remota, Dave e Abi são perseguidos por um segredo aterrorizante

programme.title: A Invasão Zumbi, (2013, Zombies)
programme.desc: Quando zumbis tomam conta de São Francisco, um grupo desesperado sobrevive trancando-se dentro da prisão de Alcatraz. Quando os mortos-vivos violam a ilha, nossos heróis são forçados a retornar ao continente invadido pelos mortos-vivos.

programme.title: American Poltergeist - Possuídos, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Ted e Lauren alugam uma velha casa no campo, de um homem chamado Jim, para trabalhar em seu estudo. À medida que o tempo passa, o casal se torna cada vez mais desconfiado dos acontecimentos e do estranho comportamento de seu anfitrião.

programme.title: Aranhas!, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando um experimento dá errado em um laboratório no meio do deserto, o local fica infestado de aranhas gigantes e ainda há pessoas presas lá dentro. Um grupo de operações de guerra chega para enfrentar o problema, mas não têm ideia do que enfrentarão ali

programme.title: Tubarões de Gelo, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Não Adianta Rezar, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A vida de Anna finalmente está entrando nos eixos. Traumatizada depois de um conturbado divórcio e de uma intensa luta para se livrar de sua dependência química, ela finalmente vai se mudar de vida.

programme.title: Tesso, um youkai de rato que tem medo de gatos, se transforma em um curandeiro e persegue Kuroro. Inuyasha e seu grupo encontram aldeões que confundem Kirara com Kuroro e tentam expulsá-la.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Espiritualista Mistérioso e a Kirara Negra

programme.title: Kikyo foi trazida de volta à vida por uma das técnicas secretas de Urasue. Ela conhece Monju, que está na mesma situação. Monju não tem almas suficientes.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Inuyasha e sua equipe estão cercados por aldeões que não gostam de Mirok. Quando eles perguntam por que, eles dizem que Mirok tem feito muitas más ações. Mirok diz que ele é inocente, e suspeita que isso seja obra de um impostor...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e sua equipe se encontram com Izumo, que está investigando o segredo da criação da Jóia. Eles ouvem que um youkai apareceu e vão investigar uma aldeia próxima.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 1

programme.title: Agome e os outros são sequestrados por youkais que estão usando falsas Jóias. Inuyasha vai salvá-los, mas Gyu-Oh fica em seu caminho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 2

programme.title: Os insetos venenosos de Narak aparecem. Sesshomaru vai atrás deles. Enquanto isso, Jaken é picado por um inseto venenoso e está morrendo. Rin fica com ele e tenta salvá-lo. Ela vai ao campo de Jinenji para obter um fruto do Sennenso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kirara desaparece e Sango está preocupada. Shippo deduz as razões de Kirara para desaparecer e culpa Inuyasha. Naquele momento, um som estrondoso vem da floresta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome é atraída para uma caverna por uma voz pedindo ajuda. Ao entrar ela encontra Kikyo, que não tem almas suficientes e enfraqueceu-se.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kikyo e Kagome Sozinhas Numa Caverna

programme.title: Ginta e Hakkaku brigam com Kuga e acabam trabalhando separadamente. Ao fazer isso, eles encontram o grupo de Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kuga e Sesshomaru, O Perigoso Confronto

programme.title: Garamaru, um youkai mariposa, prendeu Agome e os outros em um casulo e agora eles estão presos em seus pesadelos. Na vida real, Inuyasha está lutando sozinho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Pesadelo Real! A Luta na Floresta do Desespero

programme.title: A neve está caindo fora de época. Mirok é sequestrado por Koyuki, uma mulher misteriosa. Agome e os outros ouvem de um caçador e sua esposa sobre um youkai da neve. Quando eles vão procurá-lo, eles encontram Sango, que se perdeu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Sete Anos Depois; As Neves Eternas

programme.title: Um ogro gigante chamado Kyokotsu aparece nas montanhas ao norte e devora outros youkais como a tribo de lobos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Lobos são Atacados por um Zumbi

programme.title: O Exército dos Sete foi trazido de volta à vida. O calvário enviado para derrotá-los é dizimado pelo segundo mais forte, Yakotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A luta entre Yakotsu e Inuyasha é interrompida quando Mukotsu interfere. Mukotsu sequestra Agome para torná-la sua noiva. Mirok e Sango tentam salvá-la, mas o veneno de Mukotsu os impede de se mover.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango foram enfraquecidos pelo veneno de Mukotsu. Inuyasha tenta os ajudar.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: No templo, Inuyasha verifica se Agome e os outros estão seguros. Ele acaba confiando em Renkotsu e Ginkotsu o bombardeia. Inuyasha os enfrenta, mas Renkotsu rouba os fragmentos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango pararam de respirar. Inuyasha procura pelo Exército dos Sete para vingá-los. Ele vê Sesshomaru e se certifica de que é uma ilusão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se aproximam da luz de um fragmento da Jóia que parece pertencer ao Exército, mas a luz não emana energia maligna. Suikotsu, um bom médico é o dono do fragmento...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A personalidade má de Suikotsu desperta e luta contra Inuyasha. Quando as crianças o chamam para voltar a ser quem ele era, Suikotsu sente uma forte dor. Bankotsu decidiu retirar-se da vila.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Há uma barreira ao redor do Monte Hakurei que purifica os youkais ou qualquer coisa maligna. Inuyasha e os outros pensam que Narak não pode estar se escondendo no Monte e vão procurar uma pista diferente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Líder do Exército dos Sete! Bankotsu Entra em Cena

programme.title: A batalha entre Bankotsu e Inuyasha começa. Enquanto isso, Sesshomaru chega ao Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Há uma ilha sagrada em um lago cercado por névoa. Hakushin, que se tornou um Buda vivo há cem anos, é venerado lá. Mas algo estranho acontece. O pai de um garoto chamado Shintaro vai investigar, mas ele não volta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Barreira Energética da Ilha Hijiri

programme.title: Bankotsu sequestra Agome e os outros envolvidos em sua batalha contra Inuyasha. Inuyasha está fica irritado por ver que seus amigos estão se machucando.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A barreira sagrada de Monte Hakurei impede que os youkais entrem nele. Hakushin ajuda Narak e coloca a barreira.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Monte Hakurei fica mais forte, e Kikyo é impedida de entrar em seu solo sagrado. Kikyo deixa a aldeia de Chiyo, mas vai atrás do Bankotsu para ver o que o Exército dos Sete está fazendo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Suikotsu não pode matar Chiyo e os outros. Após isso, Suikotsu e Jakotsu vão para dentro do local sagrado e esperam por Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Ginkotsu morre e Renkotsu usa seu fragmento sem permissão. Ao fazê-lo, ele traiu Bankotsu. Ele deseja ainda mais poder e ataca Kuga para que ele possa pegar os fragmentos da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O mal dentro do Monte Hakurei são os youkais de Narak. Mirok arrisca sua vida para salvar Sango e suga todos os youkais com seu ataque junto com os insetos venenosos e entra em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Mirok e Sango ficam cara a cara com a múmia de Hakushin no Monte Hakurei. O santo diz a eles o motivo de ajudar Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha recupera seus poderes, derrota Jakotsu e se apressa para o Monte Hakurei. Renkotsu tem sentimentos rebeldes em relação ao Bankotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A barreira do Monte Hakurei desaparece e Inuyasha está preocupado com a Agome, que vai para o Monte com Kuga e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo e Sesshomaru sentiram que algo estranho aconteceu em diferentes locais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Batalha Decisiva! O Último e Mais Forte dos Guerreiros Zumbis

programme.title: Mirok e Sango veem um misterioso pedaço de carne nas profundezas do Monte Hakurei. Sesshomaru e Kikyo sentem algo estranho acontecendo em diferentes locais e seguem para o Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Poderosa Banryu; Duelo Mortal no Monte Hakurei

programme.title: Narak ganhou um novo corpo e renasceu. Inuyasha tenta derrotá-lo com seu ataque, mas ele se defende e fere Agome, Mirok e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo vê Kagura escapando do Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Ao investigar o suposto suicídio da filha do florista, Mista se depara com um usuário de Stand chamado Scolippi.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Após a morte de seu pai, Dio Brando entra para uma família aristocrática e jura para si mesmo que vai deixar o herdeiro deles, Jonathan “JoJo” Joestar, sem nada.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo conhece um líder de gangue chamado Speedwagon quando vai a Londres investigar o envenenamento de seu pai.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo enfrenta Dio após dar o antídoto ao pai. Durante a batalha, Dio decide usar a máscara de pedra.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O lendário cavaleiro Blueford ressuscita e confia sua espada a JoJo. Tarkus ataca JoJo com força avassaladora.

programme.title: Zeppeli ataca Tarkus, mesmo sabendo de seu destino terrível. Em um último ato de coragem, ele usa as forças que lhe restam para repassar seus poderes ao sucessor, JoJo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo resgata a irmã de Poco. Dire, um amigo de Zeppeli, bate de frente com Dio. Com a espada de Blueford nas mãos, JoJo volta a enfrentar Dio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo e Erina embarcam em um cruzeiro para a lua de mel. Mas, para o espanto de JoJo, uma pessoa ligada a Dio aparece a bordo do navio.

programme.title: O ano é 1938. Em uma ruína mexicana, diversas máscaras de pedra são descobertas. Na cidade de Nova York, um jovem chamado Smokey recebe a ajuda de Joseph, o neto de JoJo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph enfrenta Straizo, que virou vampiro após trair seu amigo Speedwagon. Terminada a batalha, Straizo avisa sobre o Homem do Pilar.

programme.title: Joseph é atacado por um dos homens de Stroheim na chegada ao México. Stroheim tenta despertar Santviento, o Homem do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph usa seu poder para tentar fugir de Santviento. Quando isso não dá certo, ele tenta expor seu inimigo à luz do sol para se salvar.

programme.title: Joseph e Speedwagon conhecem Caesar, neto de Zeppeli, quando chegam a Roma após a descoberta de que existem outros Homens do Pilar.

programme.title: Stroheim luta com Kars em seu novo corpo mecânico. Joseph e Kars caem de um precipício na tentativa de conseguir a Pedra Vermelha.

programme.title: Lisa Lisa e Joseph descobrem que Wamuu e Kars esperam por eles no hotel com uma centena de vampiros aliados, e ela elabora um plano inteligente para tirá-los dali.

programme.title: Em uma arena antiga, Joseph e Wamuu disputam uma corrida de bigas até a morte. Mesmo escolhendo a primeira arma, Joseph se vê em uma situação perigosa.

programme.title: Joseph usa a bandana de Caesar para se defender do ataque final de Wamuu. Lisa Lisa desafia Kars para um combate nas ruínas do templo.

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados viajam até Singapura pelo mar. Um Stand com usuário desconhecido ataca Jotaro assim que um passageiro clandestino é encontrado no navio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Wu Kong - Contra a Ira dos Deuses, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Há muitos anos, o Monte Huaguo foi destruído pelo Reino Celestial, a morada dos deuses da mitologia chinesa, deixando Sun Wu Kong, o Rei Macaco, furioso, já que o local era seu lar. Kong está decidido a confrontar aqueles que determinaram seu destino.

programme.title: O Dragão de Natal, (2020, Children)
programme.desc: Ayden, uma jovem mulher na Europa medieval, é a única pessoa que pode salvar o Natal depois de um duende moribundo lhe entregar um cristal mágico. Ayden e outros órfãos devem escapar às criaturas de fantasia para devolver o feitiço ao norte.

programme.title: Crônicas da Tribo Fantasma, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Quando fósseis gigantes são descobertos perto da Mongólia, uma expedição é organizada para analisá-los. Quando uma explosão deixa os membros da equipe de escavação enterrados no subsolo, eles descobrem um templo ciclópico e bestas gigantes antigas.

programme.title: Dummie A Múmia e a Tumba de Achnetut, (2017, Children)
programme.desc: Dummie está com saudades de casa e quer ir para casa visitar o túmulo de seus pais.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capitão da polícia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man é perseguido por um gângster vingativo, enquanto o exército japonês invade a região.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: Bodyguard - Resgate de Risco, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um especialista em artes marciais entra para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um rico homem de negócios. A empresa de segurança, propriedade de um velho amigo do combatente, esconde um plano de poder obscuro.

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Os métodos incomuns de um policial de Hong Kong levam ao seu rebaixamento para o trânsito, apesar do sucesso. Enquanto isso, um antigo inimigo sai da prisão em busca de vingança.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na América, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Jet Li é Wong Fei-Hong, herói chinês que vai à América, é salvo por índios e luta contra a exploração de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: Fitzwilly, (1967, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: It’s handmaiden-to-footservant combat when secretary Barbara Feldon attempts to scuttle butler Dick Van Dyke right out of the heist business in this spirited comedy that also stars John McGiver, Norman Fell, Sam Waterston and Edith Evans.

programme.title: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum, (1966, Comedy)
programme.desc: Zero Mostel, Buster Keaton, Phil Silvers, and an all-star cast scam their way through this boisterous romp amidst gorgeous girls, mistaken identities, stunning surprises, cunning disguises, and great Sondheim songs.

programme.title: The Angel Levine, (1970, Comedy)
programme.desc: A sentimental tale of an elderly Jewish tailor (Zero Mostel) who has lost his faith in God and himself. Enter a Jewish angel (Harry Belafonte), on probation, who must earn his wings by convincing the tailor that life does have meaning.

programme.title: Odds Against Tomorrow, (1959, Crime)
programme.desc: When bigoted ex-con Earl Slater agrees to carry out a heist with a disgraced former cop and his cohorts – one of whom is Black – tensions mount as the job comes together, until Earl’s seething hatred erupts, risking the heist...and their lives!

programme.title: Topkapi, (1964, Thriller)
programme.desc: Peter Ustinov won an Oscar for Best Supporting Actor in this lighthearted thriller about five thieves (including Melina Mercouri, Maximilian Schell, and Robert Morley) who undertake an absolutely impossible grand theft in Istanbul.

programme.title: The Italian Job, (1969, Thriller)
programme.desc: Charlie is out of jail and on the make with a plan for the heist of the century. Aided by top criminal mastermind Mr Bridger, Charlie sets off with a team of villains and to lift $4,000,000 from under the noses of the Turin Polizei.

programme.title: The Spy Who Came in from the Cold, (1965, Thriller)
programme.desc: Oscar® nominee Richard Burton* is the burnt-out British agent who refuses to “come in from the cold” to take a desk job.

programme.title: Witness for the Prosecution, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: Tyrone Power, Marlene Dietrich, and Charles Laughton star in this exceptional courtroom Drama about a young man on trial for a wealthy widow's murder after he suspiciously profits from her will.

programme.title: 12 Angry Men, (1957, Courtroom Drama)
programme.desc: Eleven jurors are convinced that the defendant is guilty of murder. The twelfth has no doubt of his innocence. How can this one man steer the others toward the same conclusion? Henry Fonda and Lee J. Cobb lead the all-star cast in this classic!

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: A new technologically-superior Soviet nuclear sub is heading for the U.S. coast; however, one CIA analyst thinks the captain will defect the submarine, and he only has hours to prove it.

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan is caught in the middle of a terrorist attack. Ryan helps to thwart Holmes’ assailants and becomes a local hero. But Ryan’s act marks him as a target. Now he must return to action to save his family.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan must quickly evolve from soldier to analyst to full-fledged operative to stop a devastating terrorist plot against the United States.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)

programme.title: Faceless After Dark, (2024, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey, (2022, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Studio 666, (2022, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: In Studio 666, the legendary rock band Foo Fighters move into an Encino mansion steeped in grisly rock and roll history to record their much anticipated 10th album.

programme.title: A Message from Brianna, (2021, Satanic Stories)
programme.desc: A Message from Brianna

programme.title: Halloween VI: The Curse of Michael Myers, (1995, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: The town of Haddonfield, Illinois, celebrates Halloween for the first time in five years, only to be joined in the festivities by maniacal mass murderer Michael Myers, with his nemesis, the inveterate psychiatrist Dr. Loomis, hot on his heels.

programme.title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later, (1998, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: 20 years ago, evil escaped incarceration in the form of Michael Myers, leading to a bloody killing spree on Halloween. Now, Michael has returned to terrorize a new generation, starting with original final-girl Laurie Strode (Jamie Lee Curtis).

programme.title: Halloween VIII: Resurrection, (2002, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A group of college students win a contest to spend the night in the childhood home of brutal serial killer Michael Myers. They expect a few scares, but none of them are prepared for what awaits them in this frightening follow-up to HALLOWEEN H20.

programme.title: Hollow Man, (2000, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon and Elisabeth Shue play former lovers who, along with a team of other scientists like themselves, discover the secret of invisibility. Rating: R

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Zombies)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Illuso has pulled Fugo into his mirror world as Abbacchio rushes to retrieve the key, despite Giorno’s stern advice. But Abbacchio cannot escape a similar fate, leaving him and later Giorno to resort to self-mutilation in favor of death by laceration.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Delve into the deadly battles that mold Giorno into an indispensable member of the Passione gang as he and his allies fight to protect Trish and themselves against outlandish acts of violence by members of the Hitman team.
programme.sub-title: Special Episode Golden Wind The Beginning

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Ready to escort Trish by train, the gang finds on the platform a lone turtle lingering by the drinking fountain, just as the boss instructed. But Bucciarati is stumped—departure is imminent, the enemy is closing in, and the cryptic key appears useless.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: Gyron's forces have entered the solar system and are quickly approaching Saturn. Kenji, who has been newly assigned as the Commander of the Earth Defense Force, battles against the enemy forces.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: The Earth Defense Forces are engaged in a battle against Gyron's forces from invading Earth. Takeru and the Crasher Squad fight bravely, but the enemy succeeds in destroying Ceres Space Station.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: With Takeru's help, Flore finally defeats Gyron. However, Flore hesitates to kill her father at the very last moment. Suddenly, a mysterious power kills Gyron.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: The war against Gyron is finally over. Then one day, Lozé visits Earth. She is aware that Takeru is cursed with Zule's Devil Rings and that his life is in danger.

programme.desc: Knuckle suddenly appears before Youpi to fight him head on.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Feeling the need to lay a punch on Youpi to avenge his friend Shoot, Knuckle decides to take on Youpi once more.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Ikalgo reads Palm's hidden message, which says that she has gone to the palace and to assume that she is dead if she does not respond before the start of the mission.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Youpi is impressed by the extermination team's abilities and acknowledges their strength.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Morel destroys the cocoon before him, but as he suspected, Pouf is not inside.

programme.desc: The battle between the King and the Chairman is finally about to begin.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Ikalgo remembers his mission to find Palm.

programme.desc: Shaiapouf and Menthuthuyoupi make their way to the King. While Neferpitou uses Doctor Blythe to treat Komugi.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: As Mista closes in on Sale, all signs seem to point to an easy kill. If only it weren’t for the truck hurtling up a mountainous Capri road stuck to his hand or Sale’s power to freeze all objects, gunman Mista would be celebrating over his enemy’s corpse.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Within arm’s reach of Polpo’s fortune, Bucciarati and team meet the unassuming Pericolo, a capo who has come to accept the treasure. In presenting the loot, Bucciarati is bestowed not only the rank of capo but also an immense duty: protect Trish Una.

programme.desc: Narancia is unshakable as he uses firepower and CO2 detection to survive Formaggio’s body-shrinking attack. Even beneath a spider’s fangs inside Formaggio’s bottle, Narancia reveals not Trish’s whereabouts but the bullet holes his Stand has left behind.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Giorno, Abbacchio and Fugo travel to Pompeii to find a hidden key pivotal in their protection of Trish. Facing the trio, however, is more than the lonely remains of ancient Roman villas and colonnades. Fugo spots an odd figure in an even stranger mirror.

programme.desc: Times may change…but these guys don’t! Eddie Murphy and Nick Nolte are back on the streets in this smash sequel.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat is on in this fast-paced action-comedy starring Eddie Murphy as Axel Foley, a street smart Detroit cop tracking down his best friend's killer in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat's back on! And Eddie Murphy is cool as ever in this sizzling, smash-hit sequel to Beverly Hills Cop.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Eddie's back! So are the laughs. Eddie Murphy returns as Detroit cop Axel Foley, getting down with the fun-and-sun set as never before in this revved up thrill-ride of a movie.

programme.title: 48 Hrs., (1982, Action)
programme.desc: Nolte is a rough-edged cop after two vicious cop-killers. He can't do it without the help of smooth Murphy, who is serving time for a half-million dollar robbery.

programme.title: Another 48 Hrs., (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Times may change…but these guys don’t! Eddie Murphy and Nick Nolte are back on the streets in this smash sequel.

programme.title: Lone Wolf McQuade, (1983, Action)
programme.desc: A maverick Texas Ranger throws down his guns to indulge his talents in the martial arts when he meets his match in the leader of a gun-smuggling ring.

programme.title: Missing In Action, (1984, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: American servicemen are still being held captive in Vietnam – and it's up to one man to bring them home in this blistering, fast-paced action/adventure starring martial arts superstar Chuck Norris.

programme.title: Missing In Action 2: The Beginning, (1985, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Chuck Norris returns as James Braddock in this action-packed prequel to the original hit film. As war rages in Vietnam, Braddock and his men are captured and imprisoned. With fists and sheer courage, he must become an army of one to save his men.

programme.title: Braddock: Missing In Action III, (1988, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: When Colonel James Braddock (Chuck Norris, "Missing in Action") is told that his wife and 12-year-old son are still alive in Communist Vietnam, he mounts a one-man assault to free them…armed with the latest high-tech firepower, of course!

programme.title: Code of Silence, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: When a stakeout marred by mob interference results in the death of an innocent bystander and a police cover-up, a Chicago detective is forced to adhere to his own personal code of ethics in an effort to rid the Windy City of its Warring crime factions.

programme.title: Invasion U.S.A., (1985, Action)
programme.desc: An army of terrorist mercenaries led by Soviet agent Rostov catches America unprepared and makes it a war zone from sea to shining sea. Only one man can stem the rising tide of violence: retired agent and martial arts expert Matt Hunter.

programme.title: The Delta Force, (1986, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Political extremists have taken innocent people hostage…and only super-soldiers Chuck Norris, Lee Marvin and The Delta Force can rescue them in this explosive adventure filled with wall-to-wall action! Martin Balsam and Shelley Winters also star.

programme.title: Delta Force 2: The Colombian Connection, (1990, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Chuck Norris is in peak form in this explosive action/adventure that brings back one of his most unforgettable characters, Delta Force Colonel Scott McCoy, for a daring mission to destroy a deadly drug cartel led by the ruthless Billy Drago!

programme.title: A Little Bit of Heaven, (2011, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A young woman (Kate Hudson) who uses her humor to avoid intimacy has a life-changing visit from her doctor in this divinely funny dramatic comedy. With Whoopi Goldberg and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: A Walk to Remember, (2002, Romance)
programme.desc: Two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is sentenced to perform community service.

programme.title: Forces of Nature, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: All Ben (Ben Affleck) wants to do is make it from New York to Savannah, Ga., in time for his wedding. When his flight gets canceled, Ben reluctantly joins the quirky Sarah (Sandra Bullock) in a rental car for a road trip back.

programme.title: Fools Rush In, (1997, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Matthew Perry stars as Alex Whitman, a New Yorker sent to Las Vegas to oversee a construction project. There he meets Isabel Fuentes, and some serious chemistry brings them together for one night. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: All the Pretty Horses, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: Always wanting to live the cowboy lifestyle, young John Grady (Damon) sets off for a Hacienda in Mexico. While there, John enters into a passionate romance with the spellbinding Alejandra (Cruz), much to the displeasure of her powerful father.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Romance)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: Marie Antoinette, (2006, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Written and directed by Academy Award winner Sofia Coppola, Marie Antoinette is an electrifying yet intimate re-telling of the turbulent life of history's favorite villainess. Rated: PG-13

programme.desc: An abused wife on the run from her violent husband finally decides she's had enough.

programme.title: The Illusionist, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Margot at the Wedding, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: On the eve of her estranged sister Pauline’s wedding to unemployed musician/artist/depressive Malcolm at the family seaside home, Margot shows up to rekindle the sisterly bond and offer her own brand of “support.”

programme.title: The Patriot, (2000, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: In 1776 South Carolina, widower and legendary war hero Benjamin Martin (Mel Gibson) finds himself thrust into the midst of the American Revolutionary War as he helplessly watches his family torn apart by the savage forces of the British Redcoats.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: John Sturges' The Hallelujah Trail, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Chaos reigns on the wide open plains as a host of stars, including Burt Lancaster and Lee Remick, have their eyes set on a shipment of whiskey and let loose in this wild comedy that spoofs nearly every convention of movie westerns.

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: Alias Jesse James, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: In this hilarious western spoof, insurance broker Milford Farnsworth (Bob Hope) unwittingly sells a life insurance policy worth $100,000 to the infamous Jesse James. Now, he has to figure out how to keep the deadliest outlaw in history alive!

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Adios, Sabata, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Under the brutal rule of garrison leader Col. Skimmel, a group of Mexican revolutionaries hire gunslinger Sabata (Yul Brynner) to rob a transport of gold in order to buy weapons. But the Colonel has other plans...taking the gold for himself.

programme.title: Return of Sabata, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: Billy Two Hats, (1974, Western)
programme.desc: Archie (Gregory Peck) and his partner, Billy (Desi Arnaz, Jr.) are bandits by trade, staging daring robberies throughout the American frontier. But when their latest heist takes a deadly turn, they are pursued by a ruthless marshal (Jack Warden).

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earth's past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay comes the best 'Transformers' ever! With humanity facing extinction from a terrifying new threat, it's up to the Autobots to save Earth. They'll need new allies, including inventor Cade (Mark Wahlberg) and the Dinobots!

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earth's past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction, (2014, Action)

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, (1981, Action)

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom, (1984, Action)
programme.desc: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom brings you thrills and excitement. Indy, his sidekick Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott go from high-flying action above the Himalayas to a spine-tingling escape from a fortress-like mine in India.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.title: Boyhood, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Filmed over twelve years with the same cast, Richard Linklater's acclaimed smash hit is a groundbreaking celebration of life. Stars Ethan Hawke and Patricia Arquette.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Airplane!, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: Voted “one of the 10 funniest movies ever made” by the American Film Institute, “Airplane!” is a masterpiece of off-the-wall comedy.

programme.title: Airplane II: The Sequel, (1982, Comedy)
programme.desc: There’s a mad bomber on board, the first lunar shuttle is about to self-destruct, the engines are not working, and-worst of all-the flight crew discovers they are completely out of coffee!

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Jack Reacher, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher leaps off the pages of Lee Child's novel and onto the big screen in this thriller. When a horrible crime is committed, all evidence points to the suspect in custody, who offers up a single note in defense: "Get Jack Reacher!"

programme.title: The Mask of Zorro, (1998, Super Swashbucklers)
programme.desc: When a power-crazed despot schemes to buy California from Mexico, it takes two Zorros--the legendary Don Diego de la Vega and his chosen successor Alejandro Murrieta, a dashing bandit-turned-hero-- to defeat the tyrant's unscrupulous plans.

programme.title: Heathers, (1970, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)

programme.title: Party Girl, (1995, Independent Drama)

programme.title: Foxfire, (1996, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: This film is about four high-school girls, who find that they are all being made to perform sexually with their biology teacher. This discovery leads them to become allies and friends. Shortly afterward, they exact revenge on their teacher.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction, (1987, Crime)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas plays Dan, a New York attorney who has a tryst with seductive Alex Forrest while his wife is away. Dan later shrugs off the affair as a mistake and considers it over. But Alex won't be ignored. Not now, not tomorrow, not ever.

programme.title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane, (1991, Thriller)
programme.desc: Long-forgotten child star Baby Jane Hudson berates and abuses her wheelchair-bound sister Blanche after Blanche's fame sees a resurgence when her movies are played on TV.

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Foxfire, (1996, Independent Drama)

programme.title: Eden Lake, (2008, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A young couple travels to a remote lake quarry in England, only to fend off a group of teenage hoods.

programme.title: The Innkeepers, (2011, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: The Haunting In Connecticut, (2009, Supernatural Horror)

programme.desc: Cheech and Chong make their film debut in this riotous rock'n'roll comedy, bringing with them the same madness, lifestyles and sketches that sold over 10 million records in the early 1970s.

programme.title: Starting Over, (1979, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Burt Reynolds plays Phil Potter, a low-key, contented magazine writer who tries to put his life back together after his wife Jessica (Candice Bergen) opts for independence as a singer-songwriter.

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: King Kong, (1976, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After making it through to New Domino City, Yusei confronts his old friend Jack Atlas and challenges him to a Turbo Duel.
programme.sub-title: A Blast from the Past, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the clash between Jack and Yusei comes to a climatic close, a mysterious creature appears as their two Dragons duke it out.
programme.sub-title: A Blast from the Past, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After being sent to The Facility, Yusei befriends an odd old man who duels with a treasure deck full of ancient mystic cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei duels the top dog at The Facility using Yanagi's treasure deck. Meanwhile, Jack learns about the mystery surrounding his Mark of the Crimson Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Yusei still serving out his sentence at The Facility, Jack finds himself having to face off against former Turbo Duel Champion Hunter Pace in a rematch that could send Jack's career up in smoke.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After being sent to the Maximum Security Zone in The Facility, Yusei risks being permanently placed in lockdown when he decides to duel Chief Armstrong in order to win a pardon for his pal.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the clash between Yusei and the Chief comes to a shocking conclusion, Yusei must figure out a way to win the battle before his life points get zapped to zero.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After being freed from the Facility, Yusei risks being re-incarcerated when he tries to take back his Duel Runner from Sector Security's vault.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Officer Trudge in hot pursuit, Yusei looks to rev his game up before the long arm of the law grabs a hold of him for good!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Yusei can't remember his own name, he agrees to duel a pint-sized player named Leo in the hopes of getting his memory back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As Leo and his pal Dexter venture into the narrows of New Domino City to find the mysterious duelist known as the Black Rose, Blister breaks out a plan to keep Yusei's friends in the Satellite Sector safe from Goodwin's goons.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The stage is set for the Fortune Cup as eight elite duelists vie for the chance to take on reigning champion Jack Atlas. However, for the Master of Ceremonies Rex Goodwin, it's not about who wins or loses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The second duel of the Fortune Cup is about to get under way as the mysterious duelist known as the Black Rose finds herself having to face off against a medieval menace named Sir Randsborg.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the first Turbo Duel of the Fortune Cup set to start, a surprise guest forces Yusei's competition to take an unexpected pit stop.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Director Goodwin enlists the hypnotic powers of the Professor to expose Luna as a Signer and uncover the secrets she unknowingly knows of the Duel Monsters Spirit World.
programme.sub-title: Return to the Spirit World, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between the Professor and Luna continues, Luna looks to keep a promise she made to protect the Duel Monsters Spirit World, but in order for her to succeed, she must first break free of the hypnotic hold the Professor has on her.
programme.sub-title: Return to the Spirit World, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The semifinals of the Fortune Cup are about to begin, and the first match of day two features Yusei going toe-to-toe with the tower of power - Greiger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With no cards left in his hand and his life points about to get blasted by Greiger, Yusei has one draw left to take down this tower of power to keep in the hunt to duel Jack in the championship round.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: In the second battle of the semifinals, Akiza squares off against the professional profiler Commander Koda, but with her tournament life on the line, can Akiza outplay an opponent who claims to know her every move?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the Fortune Cup Finale one win away, Yusei and Akiza get set to battle it out as Director Goodwin anxiously awaits the final Signer to reveal their Mark of the Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the back-and-forth battle between Akiza and Yusei rages on, Yusei is forced to unleash his mighty Stardust Dragon in order to stop Akiza's grisly garden from squeezing his life points into submission.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the Fortune Cup Finale about to kick into overdrive, Jack decides to clear the air and reveal the truth behind his escape from the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the finish line of the Fortune Cup fast approaching, Yusei and Jack find themselves on a collision course with destiny as they race to unlock the mystery behind the Crimson Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After defeating Jack to win the Fortune Cup Finale, Yusei is challenged to a Shadow Duel by an underground duelist whose mind has been taken over by the Dark Signers.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and his robed rival rages on, Yusei must rely on his deck if he plans to survive this Shadow Duel and uncover the truth behind the Dark Signers sinister scheme to destroy the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After agreeing to help Yusei meet with Director Goodwin, Officer Trudge unknowingly becomes one of the Dark Signers' drones and challenges a wounded Jack Atlas to a Shadow Duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Hoping to gain Yusei's trust, Director Goodwin decides to share with him the secrets behind the origin of the Satellite Sector and the ongoing war between Signer and Dark Signer.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After returning to the Satellite Sector, Yusei meets up with his old friend Crow and soon finds himself in a tag team Turbo Duel with Sector Security.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei and Crow set off to confront the Dark Signers in an effort to stop them from destroying the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: In an effort to save the Satellite Sector from being destroyed, Yusei agrees to face off against a former friend turned Dark Signer in a Shadow Duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Yusei confronts his former friend Kalin about their past in an effort to stop him from awakening the Army of Shadows.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The safety of the world hangs in the balance as Yusei tries to figure out a way to outduel and outmaneuver the unstoppable power of Kalin's dark deck.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Leo is forced to take part in an extrasensory examination with the leader of the Arcadia Movement. Can Leo pass this pop quiz, or will this psychic showdown with Sayer leave Leo locked up forever?

programme.title: Crocodile's unexpected assistance creates an opening for Luffy to advance, and Whitebeard has a surprise lurking beneath the ice that might swing the momentum in favor of the pirates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MOVING INTO THE FINAL PHASE! WHITEBEARD'S TRUMP CARD FOR RECOVERY!

programme.title: The battle rages on and the bodies pile up as Whitebeard squares off against an Admiral, Luffy gets knocked cold, and the legendary Vice-Admiral Garp finally enters the fray!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY AT THE END OF HIS TETHER! AN ALL-OUT BATTLE AT THE ORIS PLAZA!

programme.title: While awaiting his execution, Ace flashes back to a troubled youth seeking the truth about his father. Meanwhile, Luffy begs Ivan for a potentially-deadly treatment that will allow him to continue fighting!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE POWER THAT WILL SHORTEN ONE'S LIFE! ENERGY HORMONE, REDUX!

programme.title: Whitebeard struggles to withstand the full force of the Marine onslaught. With the executioner's swords hovering above Ace's head, Straw Hat Luffy discovers a new ability!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO LIVE UP TO A PROMISE! LUFFY AND COBY COLLIDE!

programme.title: Whitebeard orders his men to help Luffy clear a path to the execution scaffold, but someone close to the Rubber-man rises to derail the rescue mission at the last second!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SCAFFOLD AT LAST! THE WAY TO ACE HAS OPENED!

programme.title: Luffy must defeat the man who taught him how to fight – his own grandfather – in order to save Ace. Battling his own flesh and blood won't be easy, but a waxy ally is there to provide backup!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EACH ON DIFFERENT PATHS! LUFFY VS. GARP!

programme.title: Ace is finally free from the execution scaffold! Luffy and his brother make a fearsome team as they blaze a path toward salvation. Ravaged by the war, Whitebeard wistfully commands his men to make the journey to the New World without him!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Despite Whitebeard's order to retreat, Ace is drawn back to the battlefield by the cruel taunts of a Marine adversary. Luffy watches in horror as his brother makes what could be his last stand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE POWER THAT CAN BURN EVEN FIRE! AKAINU'S RUTHLESS PURSUIT!

programme.title: An eerie silence falls over the battlefield as Luffy and Ace share a heartbreaking final moment together. With his dying breath, Ace begs his brother to convey a message to his fellow pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LOOKING FOR THE ANSWER! FIRE FIST ACE DIES ON THE BATTLEFIELD!

programme.title: Anguished cries echo across the battlefield in the wake of Ace's tragic death. Luffy – paralyzed by grief – must be carried to safety, but Whitebeard summons the strength for one last ferocious attack!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE NAVY HEADQUARTERS FALLS! WHITEBEARD'S UNSPEAKABLE WRATH!

programme.title: Whitebeard's children watch in horror as the old man faces off against the villainous Blackbeard pirates. Though his injuries are mounting and the odds are stacked against him, Whitebeard never runs away from a fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ENDING THE MATTER! WHITEBEARD VS. THE BLACKBEARD PIRATES!

programme.title: The world reacts to Whitebeard's death with shock and awe. Meanwhile, Jimbei risks his life to save Luffy. Blackbeard reveals the depraved depths of his nefarious nature!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SHOW BEGINS! BLACKBEARD'S PLOT IS REVEALED!

programme.title: While Blackbeard and his men seek to sink Marineford, Jimbei and Luffy's desperate attempt to flee is thwarted by Akainu's fiery fists. The situation appears dire until a former enemy lends a sandy hand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE INSATIABLE AKAINU! LAVA FISTS PUMMEL LUFFY!

programme.title: Trafalgar Law and the Heart Pirates offer Luffy a submarine escape route. Blackbeard continues his reckless rampage, and a puny pink-haired marine changes the world with a scream!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE DESPERATE SCREAM! COURAGEOUS MOMENTS THAT WILL CHANGE THE FUTURE

programme.title: The Heart Pirates head for the bottom of the ocean as Trafalgar Law prepares to operate on Luffy and Jimbei. Meanwhile, the arrival of Shanks brings the bloodshed to a sudden halt!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HERE COMES SHANKS! THE WAR OF THE BEST IS FINALLY OVER!

programme.title: The world rejoices in the wake of Whitebeard's death, and a host of powerful pirates vie for his position. Meanwhile, Luffy's friends fear that Ace's death may be more than the rubber-man can handle – if he ever wakes up!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MIGHTY LEADERS FACE EACH OTHER DOWN! HERALDING THE 'NEW ERA'!

programme.title: Power-hungry pirates terrorize innocent citizens once protected by Whitebeard. Luffy's nightmarish awakening sends him on a reckless rampage that could land him in an early grave!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING AT THE MAIDEN ISLAND! THE HARSH REALITY FALLS UPON LUFFY!

programme.title: One Piece X Toriko Crossover
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A flashback to the younger days of Luffy and Ace reveals their unusual upbringing under the not-so-watchful eye of villainous mountain bandits!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY AND ACE! THE STORY OF HOW THE BROTHERS MET!

programme.title: The flashback continues as Ace robs a ruthless gang of pirates, and Luffy is left to take the fall! Will Ace and his friend Sabo let Luffy be tortured to death - or will they risk their high seas dreams to save him?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HERE COMES SABO! THE BOY AT THE GRAY TERMINAL!

programme.title: Ace and Sabo race to rescue Luffy from the clutches of a murderous gang of pirates! Sabo wants to grab Luffy and make a break for it, but Ace refuses to back down from a fight – even when he's outnumbered!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I WON'T RUN! ACE'S DESPERATE RESCUE OPERATION!

programme.title: When a nobleman recognizes Sabo in the streets, Luffy and Ace learn the painful secret of their friend's past. As a sign of solidarity, the three boys pledge to become pirates and hoist a toast to brotherhood!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE SEA SOMEDAY! THE PLEDGE OF THE THREE BRATS!

programme.title: After another beating from Garp, Luffy and his friends take to the jungle and build a pirate hideout at the top of an enormous tree. First order of business: booby trap the new place!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LEAVING THE DADAN FAMILY FOR GOOD?! THE KIDS' HIDEOUT HAS BEEN BUILT!

programme.title: Luffy and his friends vow to defeat the giant tiger that's been stealing their food. Ace gets angry when his father's identity is revealed. Sabo's parents hire pirates to track down their son!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY BECOMING AN APPRENTICE?! A MAN WHO FOUGHT AGAINST THE KING OF THE PIRATES!

programme.title: Luffy, Ace, and Sabo take pirate lessons from a mysterious old scallywag who just might know the secret to defeat the big tiger – and becoming a good captain!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE AGAINST THE BIG TIGER! WHO IS GOING TO BE CAPTAIN?!

programme.title: The brothers are captured by a gang of pirates, and Sabo is handed over to his noble father, where the boy quickly discovers a sinister plot to destroy Gray Terminal forever!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FREEDOM TAKEN AWAY! THE NOBLES' PLOT CLOSING IN ON THE BROTHERS!

programme.title: While flames spread across Gray Terminal, Sabo makes a desperate attempt to escape the trappings of his noble birth and save his brothers. Meanwhile, Luffy and Ace must fight to avoid an untimely end!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIRE HAS BEEN SET! THE GRAY TERMINAL IN CRISIS!

programme.title: Luffy is spared from a fiery death by an unlikely rescuer, but Ace refuses to leave Gray Terminal until he settles the score with Bluejam. Meanwhile, Sabo makes waves with a last-ditch escape attempt!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: WHERE CAN FREEDOM BE FOUND? A SAD DEPARTURE OF A BOY!

programme.title: Luffy and Ace receive troubling reports of a Celestial attack on Sabo's ship. Ace is eager to seek out the responsible parties and exact revenge, but a letter from his absent brother tempers his eagerness to fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TAKE GOOD CARE OF HIM! A LETTER FROM THE BROTHER!

programme.title: In the wake of Sabo's death, Luffy and Ace grow stronger than ever by continuing their daily routine of nonstop fighting. As the years pass, each brother prepares to set sail in search of future adventures!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO LIVE UP TO THE PROMISE! DEPARTURES OF THEIR OWN!

programme.title: Garp takes a beating from a heartbroken mountain bandit, and a big blue friend helps Luffy drown his despair in the newfound desire to reunite with his mates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I WANT TO SEE THEM! LUFFY'S MOURNFUL CRY!

programme.title: One by one, the Straw Hats are crushed to learn the tragic fate of Fire Fist Ace. Despite their own unique problems, the crew members' thoughts immediately turn to their crestfallen captain.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: STRAW HATS IN SHOCK! THE BAD NEWS HAS REACHED THEM!

programme.title: Luffy is determined to reassemble his scattered crew, but a powerful old friend forces him to rethink his plans. Meanwhile, Usopp fights to escape an island that wants to have him for lunch!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: REUNITED WITH DARK KING RAYLEIGH! DECISION TIME FOR LUFFY!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends search a month for the pirate Kid's treasure, but they are thwarted by an underground organization called the Red Ghost. Knowing something is afoot, Lupin sends Fujiko and Goemon to investigate.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds a piece of paper in a silk hat, an heirloom of Arsène Lupin. It's information regarding an opal statue of Venus, and since Lupin figures its ownership is his birthright, he heads to Gregoire's castle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata acquires a pie-throwing gun, and is ordered to capture Lupin. Meanwhile, Lupin and Fujiko are discussing Napoleon's treasures. It's said that the key to solving the mystery of their whereabouts lies in a scarf made by Napoleon's assistant…
programme.sub-title: An Unusual End to an Expedition for Napoleon's Treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The young girl Francoise lives near Lupin; she watches Lupin and Fujiko talking, and falls for him. But her father scolds her and tells her to stay away from thieves, but Francoise devises a plan to approach Lupin anyway…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Professor Pancho has devoted his life to solving the problem of food supply. Lupin decides to help them out and invents a rocket that flies on corn fuel, thinking that maybe he and Fujiko will take a trip to the moon…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is blackmailed; Fujiko has been kidnapped, and for ransom he must steal a jeweled crown worth 100 million dollars. Lupin and friends head to the museum where their objective lies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lady Black and Fujiko have a bet. Whoever kills Lupin will get the loser's entire jewelry collection. Lady Black lures Lupin using Fujiko so she could kill him, but why is she so passionate about wanting him dead?
programme.sub-title: Take Lupin All The Way to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Boss Largo wants Lupin dead; Lupin had just stolen a bundle of the boss's casino profits. But no run of the mill hitman would suffice to wack Lupin. But Largo sees that Lupin is suffering from a toothache, and gets an idea.
programme.sub-title: The Direct Attack! Dead Ball Strategy

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin reads the morning paper, which says that Lupin stole a 100-karat diamond that was being used in a musical. He knows he didn't do it, so he asks Fujiko and others, but they too have no idea what it's all about.
programme.sub-title: Lupin and An Old Woman's Scheme

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The nation of Janaica is troubled with coup d'etats and revolutions, but Lupin, discovering that the president's mansion houses the missing painting "Nude Venus," decides to go scope the joint with Jigen.
programme.sub-title: The Kindness Of Jigen is Seen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The master of surrealism, Monsieur Daré had spent three years working on his masterpiece, but news is out that the great object of art got stolen.
programme.sub-title: Lupin vs The Man of Two Faces

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Three incidents of bank robbery have happened; a total of 1.3 billion yen was stolen. A man calling himself Goemon is the culprit and he even sends Lupin a challenge, but Goemon wants to settle the score by himself.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of Goemon's Zantetsu Sword

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's stash of Napoleon's cash got stolen, but Lupin catches the culprit and tries to make him confess. Turns out he's only one of the followers of the Fandar cult, and heads to their holy land of Fandara.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin learns that a treasure trove lies in a volcano on Cleo Island, but it can only be reached when the mountain isn't spewing molten lava! He tries to convince Jigen and Goemon to join him but they're not interested.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko informs Lupin that fine quality diamonds from South Africa are stored in a safe of a global syndicate and importer of diamonds. Lupin makes his way as a worker in the boiler room, and steals the loot of diamonds.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds out about the jewel "Poison Trio" of the Borges family and decides to steal it after Fujiko goads him. Galdan, the nephew of Lucricia greets Lupin, and tells him that elderly Lucricia had been arrested and must be broken out of jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes on a safe-cracking rampage and rakes in 10 million francs. He needs the money to purchase the world's only rare Gold Butterfly at an auction. But Lupin drops the 10 million francs while on the run…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin scopes a jewelry museum where the billion-dollar gem Cleopatra's Tear is displayed. But Lupin can't get to it because the display case is secured by high-voltage electricity.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: No thief has ever succeeded in stealing the secret gem of Pompeii's nunnery; it's guarded by venomous snakes. Even Arsene Lupin gave up on it, since he hates snakes. But Lupin takes on the challenge. Will Lupin succeed? And what kind of secret gem is it?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Miami Bank is on the verge of bankruptcy after its last customers closed their accounts. The bank manager Garlic devises a plan to revive the bank, and drums up news that his bank had been raided by Lupin; he also asks Lupin to really do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsène Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Genius prodigy boy Romanoff has ten doctorates from Russia's Public Academy; blustering that no greater than he exists, he challenges Lupin. Since Fujiko is involved, Lupin cannot back down; what will become of this challenge?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko is the model for Norway's famous sculptor Vingel's crystal mermaid statue; she believed when he said he would give it to her the day it was finished, but Vingel gets greedy and sells it to the mayor of the city of Bergen instead.
programme.sub-title: The Mermaid That Disappears in the Midnight Sun

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin tries to steal a bunch of diamonds from a diamond auction. But the auction auditorium is at the Marine Tower above a skyscraper, and there is only one transparent elevator to get there.
programme.sub-title: The Target is Five Hundred and Fifty Five Meters Away

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin heads to Mecca to steal Mohammed's treasure. But first he is confronted by Patra Lawrence, the grandaughter of the Lawrence of Arabia, who is the chief of Mecca's special police headquarters; how will Lupin steal the treasure now?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Fujiko instigates Lupin and friends to go steal; this time their target is the Jovich Piano installed in a music hall built around it. There is no door large enough in the hall to carry the piano out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the shipment of raw diamonds that arrived at a harbor in Nice; he sneaks into the storage in the middle of the night but Zenigata was on to him. Lupin escapes with the help of Jigen and Goemon, but Fujiko gets captured.
programme.sub-title: To Arrest Lupin, the Mission at Highway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A month ago, president Gappolini of one of the world's top five trading companies, had died. Gappolini bequeathed a will saying that the heir to the company presidency will be the world's finest sharpshooter and Jigen is a target.

programme.title: Arrival, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When mysterious spacecraft touch down across the globe, an elite team - led by expert translator Louise Banks (Academy Award® nominee Amy Adams) – races against time to decipher their intent.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
